channel.title: CVE Feed for NVIDIA -- NVIDIA Data Center GPU Manager (DCGM)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for NVIDIA -- NVIDIA Data Center GPU Manager (DCGM)

item.title: CVE-2021-34398|2024-08-04T00:12:50.048Z -- nvidia -- nvidia%20data%20center%20gpu%20manager%20%28dcgm%29
item.description: NVIDIA DCGM, all versions prior to 2.2.9, contains a vulnerability in the DIAG module where any user can inject shared libraries into the DCGM server, which is usually running as root, which may lead to privilege escalation, total loss of confidentiality and integrity, and complete denial of service.
